.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkBufferMemoryBarrier-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BUFFER_MEMORY_BARRIER
* [[VUID-VkBufferMemoryBarrier-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkBufferMemoryBarrier-srcAccessMask-parameter]] pname:srcAccessMask must: be a valid combination of elink:VkAccessFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkBufferMemoryBarrier-dstAccessMask-parameter]] pname:dstAccessMask must: be a valid combination of elink:VkAccessFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkBufferMemoryBarrier-buffer-parameter]] pname:buffer must: be a valid sname:VkBuffer handle
****
